content.description: Sit start left hand on good edge and right on crimp, good foot low out to the right, pull on and go up and right to the obvious jug, adjust your feet and then follow a line of crimps up and left through the face of the boulder with small feet below you. Cross or bump to a large horn jug at the top of the middle of the face and then top out straight up over the lip.
content.location: Starting on the right side of the Deputy wall, as for Posse Comitatus, just to the left of the Sherrif wall and Lone Star.

content.description: Sit start left hand on good edge and right on crimp, good foot low out to the right, pull on and make a short but powerful move up to a bucket jug; match it and then trend straight up the arete on jugs and flakes. Easy mantle at the top of the boulder.
content.location: The right side of the Deputy wall, directly to the left of the Sherrif wall, and the start of Lone Star.

content.description: Sit start at the base of the left arete, pull on and layback excellent jugs up the sharp arete to the top of the boulder and then rock over to finish the climb.
content.location: The left side of the Deputy wall, just below the Upper wall.

content.description: This climb would be a direct sit start in the middle of this wall. Originally done at V4 by Joe M., but it seems as there may have been a break; undone post break at the moment?Likely would go at a harder grade as a sit start on small crimps, making a big move up to a crack at about head height and then finishing straight up as for Spared by Marley.
content.location: Starting in the middle of the Deputy wall, as for Posse Comitatus, just to the left of the Sherrif wall.

content.description: First of the two lower walls on the left as you walk into the area.
